alert.note: Alert for Upper Green River Basin; Upper Green River Basin Foothills; Wind River Mountains West (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 17 at 2:50PM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...Snow Showers with Possible Gusty Wind... This is a special weather statement from the National Weather Service Office in Riverton. * WHAT...Light to moderate snow with gusty winds. Accumulations around an inch. * WHERE...Lower elevations of Sublette County, northern Sweetwater County, and the west slope of the Wind River Range. * WHEN...Now through this evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Travel on roadways will be impacted by winter driving conditions and lowered visibility at times. Blowing and drifting snow will occur. This includes Wyoming Highway 28 from Farson to South Pass.

area.areaDesc: Upper Green River Basin; Upper Green River Basin Foothills; Wind River Mountains West
